title: Trouble installing the game

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Ive tried installing the microsoft visual c++ 2015 sp myself and it said the setup failed.... need help please!!!{{champion:19}}

replies.body: It looks like  [Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable Package](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) did not install properly.  I also recommend running through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure there aren't any blocks preventing a proper install, and that it's being run normally (not in compatibility mode).  I hope that helps!
